title: hammondIntro
body:
<< headSprites hammond>> 
Hello everyone, I hope you all have had a safe flight. We have alot to show you here. 
You will travel back to the Prehistoric Era with what you will witness today. 
Have some time to settle in and be ready to leave the Lodge soon for the tour!  
Also everyone, please keep in mind....  
This park is near and dear to me, so please treat it with respect.
With that said...
<< introSpeechFinished >>
Welcome everyone, to [color=#eef704]Jurrassic Park![/color] 
And you! Umm....  
What was your name again?  
You know what forget it!
I can't even remember half of the faces that I hire!
I'll just call you [color=#eef704]Techy[/color].
Being the new technician, you are going to fix any electrical issues the park may encounter. 
[color=#eef704]Ed Regis[/color], with the [color=#eef704]sunglasses[/color], will give you a tour around the Lodge, where most of the operations take place. 
Before you're off, make sure not to [color=#eef704]hurt[/color] any of MY [color=#eef704]dinosaurs[/color].
It is park property and costs alot of money. Anyways, welcome aboard the Jurassic Park team!

title: doorOne
body:
The door seems to be automatic or may be controlled remotely.
It seems to be totally reliant on electricity.

title: plantOne
body:
In front of you appears to be a gianormous plant much taller than yourself.
There also seems to be a plaque right next to it.
It says "Do NOT touch the plants!"
[[ Touch It: |plantTouched]]
[[ Don't Touch It: |plantNotTouched]]

title: plantTouched
body:
You reach in to touch the plant and...
<< peeled>> fail to see the banana that you end up slipping on.
Everyone saw it and it was hilarious.

title: plantNotTouched
body:
You decided to obey the law of the sign and walked away...
<< peeled>> But then you accidentally slip on a banana peel and touch it anyways
<< headSprites arnold>> what the hell technician!
I specifically put that sign there for a reason!
Huh? A banana peel?
Yeah right, i'll believe it when I see it.

title: plantTwo
body: You lost your plant appetite and deem plants as your mortal enemy.

title: hammondOne
body:
<< headSprites hammond>> 
Hello Techy, please tell me if there are any issues with your coworkers.
Especially that damned [color=#eef704]Nedry.[/color]

title: hammondTwo
body:
<< headSprites hammond>> 
Y'know thinking back on your resume, you are a pretty suspicious individual.
You have no education, no experience, and absolutely no qualifying skills to do this job.
But I like your moxie kid so you get a pass.

title: hammondThree
body:
<< headSprites hammond>> 
Look Techy, I've got a group to tour and you've got a job to do.
Get to work.

title: nedryOne
body:
Ugh.. Damn machine!
Worthless piece of junk!
...
<< headSprites nedry>> 
Hey you!
You're new around here right? 
Can I [i]borrow[/i] a dollar?
[[ Give a Dollar: |giveMoney]]
[[ Don't Give Dollar: |dontGiveMoney]]

title: giveMoney
body:
Thanks bud!
<< headSprites none>> 
*click*
<< headSprites nedry>>
Anyways, welcome to this dump we call a park.
I am definitely the most qualified here so if you want to know anything, just ask.
<< nedryAlt false>>

title: dontGiveMoney
body:
<< headSprites nedry>>
Alright fine then jerk.
Welcome to Jurassic Park, a hole filled with dino dung and hopeless losers.
The Old Geezer is forcing me to answer any questions you have.
Come back if you want something. Otherwise, get lost.

title: nedryAlt
body:
<< headSprites nedry>>
What do you want?
Did you have a change of heart all of a sudden?
[[ Give a Dollar: |giveMoneyAlt]]
[[ Don't Give Anything: |dontGiveMoneyAlt]]

title: giveMoneyAlt
body:
<< headSprites nedry>>
What?
I mean, I guess I'll take it.
<< headSprites none>>
click
<< headSprites nedry>>
Alright.
You ticked me off earlier but I'll forgive it just this once.
Those other bums are too incompetent to do their jobs, so if you've got any questions ask away.
<< nedryAlt false>>

title: dontGiveMoneyAlt
body:
<< headSprites nedry>>
Yeah I thought so, get lost!

title: nedryAsk
body:
<< headSprites nedry>>
What do you want new stuff?
[[ Hammond: |nedryAskHam]]
[[ Muldoon: |nedryAskMuldoon]]
[[ Regis: |nedryAskRegis]]

title: nedryAskHam
body:
<< headSprites nedry>>
Oh, that guy.
Thanks to him, i'm forced to work here against my will.
A small job he said!
He lied so I left.
But APPARENTLY thats against the law.
So it's either 10 years in a cell, 20 years in debt, or this dump.
I think i made the wrong choice...

title: nedryAskMuldoon
body:
<< headSprites nedry>>
That guy?
He's actually pretty tough.
First week he came by, he chewed out the old geezer for being an idiot about park security. 
Thanks to HIM, we have [i]actual[/i] [color=#eef704]security measures[/color] in place case the dinos decide to go awol.
I'm taking real hardware.
Let me let you in on a secret new stuff, we've got missle launchers to blow those dumb dinos to pieces.
Almost makes you [i]wish[/i] for just one dino to escape so we could use the thing.

title: nedryAskRegis
body:
<< headSprites nedry>>
Regis?
That guy is a total wuss.
Freaks out at the slightest hint of danger.
One time, when a worker got bit by a dino no bigger than that trash can-
Regis ran away and locked himself in the bunker at the south end of the island.
It took the rest of the day to get him out.
With incompetence like that, it makes me glad hes out there picking up dino dung and i'm operating the control systems.
Huh?
He's in charge of training recruits now? Things [i]must[/i] be getting desperate.
good luck, you'll need it.

title: arnold
body:
<< headSprites arnold>> 
Hello and welcome to Jurassic Park, we hope you enjoy your stay and-
Oh, its you..
Thank god.
I can't stand babysitting a bunch of tourists.
Anyways, I am John Arnold.
And you are?
...
......
...........
Ok then, I guess I'll just call you Technician.

title: arnoldAsk
body:
<< headSprites arnold>> 
Hey Technician, what's going on?
[[ Dennis: |arnoldAskDennis]]
[[ Job: |arnoldAskJob]]
[[ Hammond: |arnoldAskHammond]]

title: arnoldAskDennis
body:
<< headSprites arnold>> 
Can't say we exactly meet eye to eye.
He is very condescending and acts high and mighty.
Personally, I say just to stay away from him.
Honestly, I don't even think he wants to be here.

title: arnoldAskJob
body:
<< headSprites arnold>> 
What do I do?
I'm the chief engineer, so I guess that means I'm your boss.
I don't really care for titles though so please don't go calling me sir.
Too-
much- 
responsibility.

title: arnoldAskHammond
body:
<< headSprites arnold>> 
Mr. Hammond?
Well I cant say that I share the same burning passion he does for dinosaurs.
After all, he launched a whole park on the idea of it.
As ambitious as he is, he doesn't have much practical vision.
Meaning he asks for too much that we just cannot possibly deliver.
Not because we are bad at our jobs, but because his expectations are just too high.

title: wuOne
body:
<< headSprites wu>> 
Sorry, but I'm on my break if you want a tour guide please check with the man standing next to that giant blue plant over there.
Wait
Sorry technician, I thought you were one of those tourists. 
Actually, what are you doing here to begin with? Aren't you to undergo training, I doubt you already finished it?
...
No matter.
If you need something, I'll be here.

title: wuThree
body:
<< headSprites wu>> 
Have you talked to Muldoon yet? I'm sure he'd like to meet you.
He's the scary-looking guy next to the reception desk.

title: wuTwo
body:
<< headSprites wu>> 
I would not be here if I had a choice. 
Mr Hammond told me that I must greet the tourists because it is the first reveal of the park to a public audience.
I can understand the importance but why me?
I would be better off working in the labs!

title: wuFour
body:
<< headSprites wu>> 
Technician, [i]surely[/i] you have better things to do. I want to eat my pasta.

title: muldoonOne
body:
<< headSprites muldoon>> 
You're the new technician, right?
Welcome to the team.
The name's Muldoon and I'm the park warden.
I saw your resume, and I can't say that I would hire you, but Hammond is a strange man.
Look, I'll tell you what I told everyone else...
Always prioritize [color=#eef704]human life[/color] above all else. 
I don't care if your a scientist, programmer, or [color=#eef704]technician.[/color]
Just because your not out there doesn't mean it still doesn't apply.
Anyways, be seeing you tech.

title: muldoonFour
body:
<< headSprites muldoon>> 
Hello Tech. Sorry, but theres no time to talk right now.
Go talk with Ed Regis, near the benches.

title: muldoonFive
body:
<< headSprites muldoon>> 
You should really get on with that training, Tech.

title: regisOne
body:
<< headSprites regis>> 
Hey!
You must be the new guy, erm new girl?
Honestly, I have no clue what you are.
.
..
....
Anyways! The name's [color=#eef704]Regis.[/color]
I'm supposed to be showing you around the park. It is very big, and very easy to get lost in...
But don't start worrying! You have the best guide in the world!
As excited I am to begin this great tour, you should try to get to know your fellow coworkers.
They are all here in the lobby.
There's [color=#eef704]Wu[/color], the sad one eating spaghetti by himself.
[color=#eef704]Nedry[/color], he's by the vending machine.
[color=#eef704]Arnold[/color], the one by the blue plant.
And finally [color=#eef704]Muldoon[/color], by the door near the reception desk.
After you're done, meet back here and we'll begin the tour!

title: regisTwo
body:
<< headSprites regis>> 
Hey tech!
Did you finish introducing yourself?
[[ Yes, let's go: |regisBeginYes]]
[[ No, not yet: |regisBeginNo]]

title: regisBeginYes
body:
<< headSprites regis>> 
Oh great!
Ok so before be head out, I need to teach you what to do if you get in an encounter with a dinosaur while working the park. 
I know that being a technician, you might not ever interact with the dinosaurs, but it's still procedure. 
<< beginMockFight>>
Sorry about this!

title: regisBeginNo
body:
<< headSprites regis>> 
Oh well, that's okay!
Take your time, but please don't take too long. 
Mr Hammond gets mad when we're slacking off on the job.

title: grantOne
body:
<< headSprites grant>> 
This place is just amazing!
How is this even possible?
You work here right?
Can you tell me how this was made? Please?
[[ I don't know: |grantClueless]]
[[ I know: |grantKnowledge]]

title: grantClueless
body:
<< headSprites grant>> 
Oh, thats...
disappointing. 
Well, do you know anybody who [i]can[/i] explain?
[[ Yes: |grantCluelessYes]]
[[ No: |grantCluelessNo]]

title: grantKnowledge
body:
<< headSprites grant>> 
Really! How?
.
...
....
Company secrets, I guess?
...
....
.....
Ok, fine I'll back off.

title: grantCluelessYes
body:
<< headSprites grant>> 
You do?
Well, who?
..
...
.....
Uh.
<< headSprites hammond>>
Technician!
What are you doing!
Get back to work!
<< headSprites grant>> 
You mean, I was talking to a Technician the whole time?
I hate this place.

title: grantCluelessNo
body:
<< headSprites grant>> 
That's....
fine.
So um...
What [i]do[/i] you do here?
..
....
.....
Ok, good talk.

title: grantTwo
body:
<< headSprites grant>> 
Thanks for the uh, "help". I think I can just take over from here.

title: muldoonTwo
body:
<< headSprites muldoon>> 
This place isn't so bad once you get used to it, just don't be afraid to speak up when leadership is lacking. 
As a matter of fact, if Hammond is telling you to do anything stupid, you have my blessing to [color=#eef704]disobey.[/color]
Just don't overdue it, ok?
I don't want to get yelled at on your behalf because you're too lazy to do your job.

title: muldoonThree
body:
<< headSprites muldoon>> 
Y'know, I don't mind you quiet types. Everyone has their reasons, and that's fine by me.
Just know that due to your lack of speaking, your [color=#eef704]actions[/color] hold more weight. 
So try to be considerate to your surroundings. 
Who knows, it might just save your life one day.

title: malcolmAndGennaroConvoOne
body:
(Malcolm and Gennaro don't seem to notice you despite standing next to them)
<< headSprites gennaro>> 
This place sure is something, isn't it?
<< headSprites malcolm>> 
It's impressive, but not secure.
<< headSprites gennaro>> 
What do you mean?
<< headSprites malcolm>> 
I mean that this park is doomed to fail.
There are just too many conditions at play.
<< headSprites gennaro>> 
Such as?
<< headSprites malcolm>> 
We'll to start, everything here is connected to a system, what if the system turns off, what'll they do then?
Not only that, but they seem poorly equipped to handle any such event.
<< headSprites gennaro>> 
But the employees? Surely they can be trusted to do their [i]jobs[/i] and keep the park healthy.
<< headSprites malcolm>> 
The employees are also a problem. You've seen all of them, they are way too incompetent at managing the park.
However,
There is the unknown quantity of the newest one.
Nobody here seems to know anything about them.
<< headSprites gennaro>> 
Are you trying to say that the recruit has the ability to prevent this "disaster?"
<< headSprites malcolm>> 
Not at all, but rather, they may determine the fallout that comes with it.
The consequences of said disaster.
<< headSprites gennaro>> 
I don't know Malcolm, this is probably your most far fetched theory to date.
<< headSprites malcolm>> 
Unfortunately, thats what most say right before they're about to come true.
<< headSprites gennaro>> 
Spooky

title: malcolmAndGennaroConvoTwo
body: (You overhear them bounce back and forth from arguing about chaos theory to arguing about whether bananas are better than apples)

title: lexAndTimConvoOne
body:
<< headSprites lex>>
Look it's them!
Hey you work here right?
What do you do here?
Can we look at the dinosaurs?
Where's the bathroom?
Why are you so short?
<< headSprites tim>> 
Lex! Stop it!
They just got here!
But uh, can we see the dinosaurs?
Please
<< headSprites lex>>
Pretty please?
<< headSprites hammond>> 
You kids better behave yourselves!
No peeking at the exhibits before all of us depart tomorrow.
<< headSprites lex>> 
That's no fun! Ugh, what else are we gonna do!

title: lexAndTimConvoTwo
body:
<< headSprites lex>> 
You're pretty weird you know that?
<< headSprites tim>> 
Lex!
<< headSprites lex>> 
But it's true!
<< headSprites tim>> 
You don't just say stuff like that Lex!
It's rude!
<< headSprites lex>> 
Why not? I hear adults saying mean stuff all the time!
Like that fat guy at the vending machine!
<< headSprites nedry>> 
(What did you say about me you little brat!)
<< headSprites lex>> 
Or that guy with the sunglasses! People say mean stuff about him all the time!
<< headSprites regis>> 
(People say mean stuff about me?)
<< headSprites tim>> 
Lex! Quiet down! Everyone can hear you!

title: lexAndTimConvoThree
body:
(Hammond shoots a glance at you as if he's telling you to stop indulging the kids)
(You reluctantly [i]indulge[/i] him)

title: doorExit
body:
<< headSprites muldoon>> 
And where do you think you're going?
You've got training to complete, go talk with Regis.

title: vendingMachine
body:
You look inside of the vending machine and see four of the same banana painted a different color-
four of the same types of generic candy bars-
and four eggs each stylized with a different hat.

title: painting
body:
You look at the painting in awe, starstruck by it's creativity.
You just can't stop looking at it.
Eventually, you stop looking at it.

title: powerBlackout
body:
<< headSprites regis>> 
Great job tech!
You did well and I think it's finally time to check out the control roo-
<< blackout>>
!
!
Uh oh.
Wells thats not good.
<< headSprites malcolm>> 
(Called it)
<< headSprites lex>> 
Why is it so dark?
Is that supposed to happen?
<< headSprites arnold>> 
It seems that the power went out and the syste-
<< headSprites hammond>> 
WHY DID EVERTHING TURN OFF!
WHO IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THIS!
<< headSprites muldoon>> 
Calm down Mr. Hammond, I'm sure nobody is to blame.
<< headSprites nedry>> 
( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
<< headSprites hammond>>
THEN WHY DID THIS HAPPEN?
<< headSprites arnold>> 
Mr. Hammond, I'm sure it's just a short circuit somewhere and that all we need to do is fix a single electrical box.
Just in case it's not though-
Nedry and I should stay to moniter the park systems in case of another breach.
<< headSprites hammond>>
This better not be the fault of your lousely programming Nedry!
<< headSprites nedry>>
( ͠° ͟ʖ ͡°)
<< headSprites hammond>>
Technician, I want you to get out there and fix that box!
Ed Regis, go with them!
Use the door near the reception.
Regis will tell you the way.
<< blackoutDialogueChanges>>
NOW HURRY UP!

title: regisBlackout
body:
<< headSprites regis>> 
Oh god...
Uhm, don't worry T-tech, I'll follow right behind you.
I just uh, need to get my barrings first.

title: nedryBlackout
body:
<< headSprites nedry>> 
Oh no!
How could the park systems so easily be defeated!
Who could have done this?
¯\_( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)_/¯
I guess we'll never know...

title: arnoldBlackout
body:
<< headSprites arnold>> 
Don't worry about us Technician, we'll be fine!
Keep yourself safe when doing out there!
A power shutdown may mean the electrical fences are offline!

title: wuBlackout
body:
<< headSprites wu>> 
A blackout?
That's horrible!
Not only for the dinosaurs potentially escaping,-
but also for the cold spaghetti that I was microwaving!

title: muldoonBlackout
body:
<< headSprites muldoon>> 
Get going kid, a lot of people are counting on you.

title: lexAndTimConvoBlackout
body:
<< headSprites lex>> 
Thank god the power went out so I don't have to look at your ugly face!
<< headSprites tim>> 
Lex! If you don't shut up!

title: grantBlackout
body:
<< headSprites grant>> 
A blackout? Great.
Just great.

title: malcolmAndGennaroConvoBlackout
body:
<< headSprites malcolm>> 
I knew it!
Man, being right always feels so good.
<< headSprites gennaro>> 
Ok, fine you're kind of right, but the rest still hasn't come true!
<< headSprites malcolm>> 
We'll see in good time my friend, we will see.

title: hammondBlackout
body:
<< headSprites hammond>> 
What are you doing standing around for!
Get out there and fix my park!

title: doorNextLevel
body:
<< headSprites muldoon>> 
Hey Tech hold on a minute!
Things might get dangerous out there and might get hectic in here.
Take these,
<< headSprites none>> 
(You recieved a flashlight, a backpack, and a radio)
<< headSprites muldoon>> 
There you go, now good luck out there!
Try to get back in one piece, eh?
<< headSprites regis>>
Oh you're ready Tech? 
<< nextLevel>> 
Alright let's head out.
